00353 
00359     public class ButtonListener9 implements FieldChangeListener {
00360         Citation c;
00361         CitationScreen9 cs9;
00362 
00363         public ButtonListener9(CitationScreen9 _cs9, Citation _c) {
00364             c = _c;
00365             cs9 = _cs9;
00366         }
00367 
00368         public void fieldChanged(Field field, int context) {
00369             ButtonField btn = (ButtonField) field;
00370             if (btn.getLabel().toString() == "Prev") {
00371                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(UiApplication.getUiApplication().getActiveScreen());
00372             } else if (btn.getLabel().toString() == "Re-Print"
00373                     || btn.getLabel().toString() == "Print & Submit") {
00374                 // No further modifications to the citation are now allowed
00375                 c.setReadOnly(true);
00376                 
00377                 CitationOutput c_out = new CitationOutput();
00378                 if (btn.getLabel().toString() == "Print & Submit"){
00379                     Status.show("Sending Citation Record...");
00380                     c_out.submitCitation(c);
00381                 }
00382                 
00383                 // Dump all screens on the stack and re-load screen 1 and this preview screen (8).
00384                 while (UiApplication.getUiApplication().getScreenCount() > 0){
00385                     UiApplication.getUiApplication().popScreen(UiApplication.getUiApplication().getActiveScreen());
00386                 }
00387                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen1(c));
00388                 UiApplication.getUiApplication().pushScreen(new CitationScreen9(c));
00389             }
00390         }
00391     }
00392 }
